titles.title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives for the service of M. Pope Barrow, Jr.
Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives for the service of M. Pope Barrow, Jr.

action.text: Mr. Dingell asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 635.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the gratitude of the House of Representatives to: (1) M. Pope Barrow, Jr., for his 40 years of service to the House; and (2) the Office of the Legislative Counsel for its more than 90 years of assistance in the drafting of legislation considered by the House.
